content:
You're welcome! I hope you find Mint helpful in tracking your expenses and staying on top of your finances.

That's an interesting observation about your social circle! It's always fascinating to notice patterns and trends in our personal networks. The fact that you have a slight majority of female friends is not unusual, as research suggests that many people tend to have more female friends than male friends.

However, it's great that you're taking the time to reflect on your social circle and notice these trends. This kind of self-awareness can be helpful in understanding your relationships and social dynamics.

If you don't mind me asking, what inspired you to count the gender ratio of your close friends? Was there a particular conversation or event that prompted you to take notice of this trend?
